Class Summary
Class Description
CheckUrl
its the class that store all data that i want to save about any threads
CrawlerWeb
this class is a class that is inherit from the class thread then it needs to implement the run function that it run when the main thread do start and in the run function this class running an crawler programing
CreateThread
this servlet get request from the first servlet "servletCrawler" to caring to create for any request an thread
DataBase
this class store in a map all data of any thread
MyContextListener
This class implements many listeners under one class Note that the listener is using INIT parameters of the CONTEXT that are DEFINED in the web.xml file (the params MyServlet are private to the servlet) UNCOMMENT THE ANNOTATION @WebListener TO ENABLE THIS CODE
ServletCrawler
this servlet on "get" show to the user an static html that ask an url from the user
ShowResultServlet
this servlet get from an request to show the result how the crawler
